exits.Fire Temple Near Boss:
(logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or Goron_Tunic) and
                (is_adult or logic_fire_mq_child_flame) and
                (has_fire_source or
                    (can_gdv and (can_isg or is_adult)))
exits.Fire Temple Big Lava Room:
(is_adult or logic_fire_mq_child_flame) and
                can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or Goron_Tunic)
exits.Fire Temple Lower Flare Dancer Room:
can_weirdshot and can_shield and Biggoron_Sword and
                Megaton_Hammer

locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest:
can_weirdshot or
                (can_gdv and can_use(Hover_Boots) and glitch_fire_mq_torch_puzzle and Goron_Tunic) or
                (is_adult and
                ((logic_fire_mq_near_boss and has_fire_source and Bow) or
                    ((Hover_Boots or Hookshot) and
                        ((can_use(Fire_Arrows) and can_break_heated_crate) or
                            (can_use(Dins_Fire) and
                                ((damage_multiplier != 'ohko' and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple') or
                                    Goron_Tunic or Hover_Boots or Bow or Longshot)))))
                )
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Pot 1:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots)
                or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Pot 2:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots)
                or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Right Lower Cra: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)) and can_break_heated_crate
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)) and can_break_heated_crate
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Right Mid Crate: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)) and can_break_heated_crate
locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Right Upper Cra: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (can_use(Goron_Tunic) and can_mega)) and can_break_heated_crate

exits.Fire Temple Before Boss:
can_mega or
                (fire_temple_shortcuts and (is_adult or (is_child and can_damage_boost))) or
                (is_adult and (logic_fire_boss_door_jump or Hover_Boots))

savewarp: DMC Fire Temple Entrance -> Fire Temple Lower

exits.Volvagia Boss Room:
Boss_Key_Fire_Temple or
                at('Fire Temple Near Boss',can_use(Goron_Tunic) and glitch_fire_bk_skip_hover and can_hover_no_trick and has_bombchus) or
                at('Fire Temple Flame Maze',glitch_ledge_clip and glitch_fire_bk_skip_ledge)

region_name: Fire Temple Lower Locked Door After Stalfos
Fire Temple Lower Flare Dancer Room

locations.Fire Temple MQ Map Chest:
(has_soul(Flare_Dancer) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or
                at('Fire Temple Lower',can_weirdshot)

locations.Fire Temple MQ Big Lava Room Blocked Doo:
(can_use(Hookshot) or logic_fire_mq_blocked_chest) and has_explosives and is_adult and
                (has_fire_source or can_gdv or can_weirdshot)

exits.Fire Temple BK Room:
is_adult and
                (has_fire_source or can_gdv) and (Bow or logic_fire_mq_bk_chest) and (can_use(Hookshot) or logic_fire_song_of_time)

locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Chest:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False)))
locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Chest Room Pot 1:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or can_use(Boomerang) or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False)))
locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Chest Room Pot 2:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or can_use(Boomerang) or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False)))
locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Hookshot Wonderi:
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False))))
                or (can_use(Hookshot) and can_use(Boomerang))
locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Arrow Wonderitem:
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_mega or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False))))
                or (can_use(Bow) and can_use(Boomerang))
locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and (can_use_projectile or
                (adv_fire_mq_bk_chest_flame_skip and (can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True) or can_live_dmg(0.25,False,False))))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Side Room C:
has_explosives and
                (logic_fire_mq_maze_side_room or at('Fire Temple Upper Lizalfos Maze', True))

exits.Fire Temple Upper Lizalfos Maze:
((has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches) and Hookshot) or
                (logic_fire_mq_maze_hovers and Hover_Boots) or logic_fire_mq_maze_jump

exits.Fire Temple Block On Fire Room:
(glitch_fire_scarecrow_hover and can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_hover_no_trick and has_bombchus) or
                (
                (Longshot or (can_play(Song_of_Time) and Hookshot)) and
                (has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches or (Longshot and logic_fire_scarecrow))
                )

region_name: Fire Temple Block On Fire Room
Fire Temple Shoot Torch On Wall Room

locations.Fire Temple MQ GS Above Flame Maze:
(logic_fire_mq_above_maze_gs and Longshot) or
                at('Fire Temple Hammer Steps', Hookshot)

region_name: Fire Temple Flame Maze Side Room
Fire Temple Before Upper Flare Dancer
